description: This dashboard provides a holistic view of Kubeshark resource consumption, in addition to custom metrics that offer insights into what Kubeshark is doing internally

targets.expr: sum by(node) (rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{container!="", device=~"(/dev/)?(mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|md.+|dasd.+)", pod=~"kubeshark-worker.*", node=~"$node" }[$__rate_interval]) + rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{container!="", device=~"(/dev/)?(mmcblk.p.+|nvme.+|rbd.+|sd.+|vd.+|xvd.+|dm-.+|md.+|dasd.+)", pod=~"kubeshark-worker.*", node=~"$node"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", container!="", image!="", pod=~"kubeshark-[front|hub].*"}) by (pod, node)

title: Kubeshark Dashboard v3
